last_episode_to_air.name: Let It Snow, Let It Snow

name: Silver Spoons
overview:
Silver Spoons is an American sitcom that aired on NBC from September 25, 1982 to May 11, 1986 and in first-run syndication from September 15, 1986 to March 4, 1987. The series was produced by Embassy Television for the first four seasons, until Embassy Communications moved the series to syndication.

Silver Spoons was created by Martin Cohan, Howard Leeds and Ben Starr. The show's title refers to family wealth and to the expression that rich children are born with "silver spoons" in their mouthsâ€”they are given only the very best and want for nothing.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Edward Stratton III is the epitome of the overgrown child. His lawyer Leonard Rollins has just informed him that his business manager Lou says he is broke and Edward is more interested in playing a game of PacMan. The Stratton mansion looks more like an arcade with video games lining the walls and a scale model train in the middle of the room that actually goes all over the property. Edward is totally taken by surprise when a blonde 12 year old boy arrives and introduces himself as Edward's son Ricky. Edward had been married to Ricky's mother Evelyn for seven days and until that moment he had no clue that he was a father. We meet Edward's assistant Kate Summers during a thoughtful moment of her mentioning that perhaps Edward should hold off on a charity donation until his finances were back in shape. After discovering and proving that Lou had really embezzled Edward's money, Ricky tries to convince his father to let him move in with him instead of making him return to military school.

episodes.name: Boys Will Be Boys
episodes.overview: Rickys friend Derrick moves into the neighborhood and convinces him that the only reason Edward dosent punish him is because he dosent love him.

episodes.name: Grandfather Stratton
episodes.overview: Ricky wants to meet his grandfather.

episodes.name: Me & Mr. T
episodes.overview: When Ricky is bullied at school, Edward hires a bodyguard to make sure the problem never happens again.

episodes.name: Takin' a Chance on Love
episodes.overview: Ricky gets his first taste of puppy love when a new girl named Sally Frumble transfers to his school.

episodes.name: Evelyn Returns
episodes.overview: Rick's mother Evelyn arrives to challenge Edward for custody.

episodes.name: The Great Computer Caper
episodes.overview: Ricky is interviewed by a school reporter and goes on the run after hacking into a top secret government file.

episodes.name: I'm Just Wild About Harry
episodes.overview: Ricky and Derek find a lost orangutan and Ricky wants to keep him.

episodes.name: Honor Thy Father
episodes.overview: Ricky forces Edward to attend a banquet honoring Edward II.

episodes.name: Father Nature
episodes.overview: Ricky convinces Edward to take him camping so he can earn his badger paws.

episodes.name: A Little Magic
episodes.overview: Convinced that Kate is in love with him, Ricky decides to set her up with Edward.

episodes.name: Falling in Love Again
episodes.overview: Kate goes on a grudge date to make Edward jealous. It works and the two admit their feelings for each other in the middle of Carnegie Hall.

episodes.name: The Best Christmas Ever
episodes.overview: Edward and Ricky play Santa to a family living in a cave on their property.

episodes.name: The Most Beautiful Girl in the World
episodes.overview: After Derek saves his life Ricky is forced to pose as his date at a co-ed party.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Kids
episodes.overview: Ox,the bully,(see Me and Mr.T)takes Ricky to court for whiplash and is in a wheelchair. Ricky insists that the jury be made up of twelve kids.

episodes.name: The Toy Wonder
episodes.overview: Ricky pretends to like an obnoxious girl so Edward can hire her as a toy consultant.

episodes.name: Popcorn
episodes.overview: Ricky volunteers Edward to buy 1000 bags of popcorn to send the band to Washington.

episodes.name: Junior Businessman
episodes.overview: Edward gives Ricky an ice cream parlor to run for a week as a school assignment.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Ricky feels left out when Kate joins them on a ski trip.

episodes.name: The Empire Strikes Out
episodes.overview: Edward II tries to get Kate to move to California so Edward will marry someone to expand the family fortune.

episodes.name: Won't You Go Home, Bob Danish?
episodes.overview: The man Kate used to make Edward jealous (*see Falling In Love Again) crashes his airplane in the Stratton's backyard to impress her.

episodes.name: The `X' Team
episodes.overview: Kate catches Ricky, JT and Freddy watching an X-rated movie while Edward is sleeping.

episodes.name: Passports to Pleasure
episodes.overview: Derek and Ricky pick up cheerleaders while in Chicago for a Badger Patrol convention.

episodes.name: Attack of the Giant Frog People
episodes.overview: Derek and JT put frogs in Freddy's sleeping bag during a slumber party. Ricky hurts Freddy by saying that he isn't his friend.

episodes.name: A Fair to Remember
episodes.overview: Ricky impresses his science teacher by doing a project with laser beams. Kate is promoted to Vice President of Eddie Toys.

episodes.name: Hospital
episodes.overview: Edward is hospitalized when he has a gallstone attack.

episodes.name: Mr. President
episodes.overview: Ricky daydreams that he is the President of the United States.

episodes.name: Driver Ed
episodes.overview: While Edward and Kate are away Grandfather tries to teach Ricky to drive.

episodes.name: Menudo Madness
episodes.overview: To impress a girl, Ricky promises to have the pop group Menudo play at his private party.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: The family celebrates Ricky's 13th birthday with an evening of arguments.

episodes.name: Sounds of Silence
episodes.overview: Ricky pretends to play in the school orchestra's production of Peter and the Wolf so Edward won't be disappointed that he isn't musical.

episodes.name: Rick the Greek
episodes.overview: Ricky gets in over his head when he, Derek and Freddy bet on football games.

episodes.name: Uneasy Rider
episodes.overview: Ricky manipulates Evelyn into buying him a motor bike after Edward said he couldn't have one.

episodes.name: The World's Greatest Father
episodes.overview: JT's father is offended by how much time Edward is spending with his son.

episodes.name: I Want to Be Alone
episodes.overview: Dexter gets dragged to the country for a camping trip by the family.

episodes.name: Mr. Cool
episodes.overview: Ricky turns punk rocker to try to impress a girl.

episodes.name: St. Louis Blues
episodes.overview: After his parents have an argument, Derek hides out at Ricky's. His mother arrives to take him to St. Louis. ** This is Jason Bateman's final appearance.

episodes.name: A Hunting We Will Go
episodes.overview: Against his better judgment Edward agrees to let Ricky go hunting with Grandfather.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Ricky thinks that a fellow baseball player likes him when in all actuality it's Edward that she wants.

episodes.name: A Summer's Romance (1)
episodes.overview: Edward's former girlfriend decides she wants him back.

episodes.name: A Summer's Romance (2)
episodes.overview: Edward is forced to choose between Kate and Veronica.

episodes.name: Spare the Rod
episodes.overview: Ricky discovers that a friend is being beaten by his father.

episodes.name: Blazing Hotel Rooms
episodes.overview: Edward, Ricky and Dexter are trapped as their hotel catches on fire during a toy convention.

episodes.name: Hi, Mom
episodes.overview: Kate's mom arrives for a surprise visit and discovers that Kate and Edward are involved.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Ricky meets Alfonso, Dexters nephew.

episodes.name: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.overview: Ricky starts his first day in high school.

episodes.name: Growing Pains (1)
episodes.overview: Rick is outraged by being treated like a ""child"" when Edward becomes furious with him for breaking his curfew, in part one of a special two-part story.

episodes.name: Growing Pains (2)
episodes.overview: Rick exhibits his independence by running away, but he soon begins to appreciate what he's left, in the conclusion of a special two-part story.

episodes.name: A Dark and Stormy Night
episodes.overview: When the television goes out on a stormy Halloween night, Rick, Alfonso and Freddy use their imaginations to create their own late-night horror story.

episodes.name: I Won't Dance
episodes.overview: Rick plays Cupid by introducing Grandfather Stratton to his history teacher, played by Barbara Billingsley of ""Leave It To Beaver.""

episodes.name: Voyage of the Darned (1)
episodes.overview: Edward, Rick, Dexter, Alfonso and Kate are faced with one small detour on their way to the Caribbean when Kate pilots the plane through the Bermuda Triangle, in part one of a two-part story.

episodes.name: Voyage of the Darned (2)
episodes.overview: After their plane crashes on a deserted island, Rick Alfonso, Dexter, Edward and Kate must battle Mother Nature to survive, in the conclusion of a two-part story.

episodes.name: The Call of the Wild
episodes.overview: Rick's mom shows up with an ex-pro football player as a boyfriend and a ""new"" outlook on life.

episodes.name: Beauties and the Beasts
episodes.overview: In an effort to save the freshman newspaper, Rick, Alfonso and Freddy create a freshman beauty pageant, hoping everyone will ""read all about it.""

episodes.name: Twas the Night Before Christmas
episodes.overview: Edward's true Christmas spirit is tested when the Strattons welcome Freddy and his family after a tragedy leaves them homeless.

episodes.name: Lulu's Back in Town
episodes.overview: Pearl Bailey as Lula Baker, Edward's former governess returns to the Stratton household and becomes the foil in Rick and Alfonso's secret scheme.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Grandfather
episodes.overview: Edward, Kate and Rick have their hands full when Grandfather Stratton trades his empire for a beautiful blonde and a powerful Porsche.

episodes.name: Special Friend
episodes.overview: Rick finds out that he can't ""save the world"" when he gets involved with a peer-counseling program.

episodes.name: What's Cookin'?
episodes.overview: Lulu holds the key to solving a rift between Rick and his grandfather.

episodes.name: Marry Me, Marry Me (1)
episodes.overview: Edward pops the question to Kate when she receives a job offer, in the first of a special two-part story.

episodes.name: Marry Me, Marry Me (2)
episodes.overview: Edward and Rick successfully persuade Kate to change her mind, bringing long-awaited wedding bells to the Stratton household, in the conclusion of a special two-part story.

episodes.name: Rick and the Legend
episodes.overview: Rick is estatic when a hip 16-year-old wants to hang around him, but Edward is suspect of his motives - especially when his gold pen suddenly disappears.

episodes.name: Trouble with Words
episodes.overview: Bruce Jenner helps solve the puzzle of Alfonso's poor school performance - the missing piece is the learning disorder dyslexia.

episodes.name: Hot Shot
episodes.overview: Consumer advocate, David Horowitz helps Rick ""fight back"" against a crooked mail order camera company.

episodes.name: Return of the Paisley Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Rick surprises his dad for his 40th birthday with a reunion of his college singer partner, which prompts Edward to take the old act on the road again.

episodes.name: All the Principal's Men
episodes.overview: Rick must choose between getting suspended or revealing his source when he exposes a cafeteria scandal on his school's cable news show.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Ricky Stratton
episodes.overview: A blind date with a computer pen pal panics Rick after they exchange photos.

episodes.name: The Babysitters
episodes.overview: While babysitting, Rick suspects that 6-year-old Beth is a victim of parental kidnapping.

episodes.name: Head Over Heels
episodes.overview: Whitney Houston gets more than she expects during a visit to the Stratton household when Dexter decides to move to Los Angeles with the singing star.

episodes.name: Mrs. Stratton Builds Her Dreamhouse
episodes.overview: As new wife and mother, Late begins making changes in the Stratton household that Edward supports and Rick resents.

episodes.name: Poor Evelyn
episodes.overview: Rick coerces Edward into offering his mom a job, after an embezzler takes all her money.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: Rick's girlfriend has something in mind for their relationship that is a serious step for Rick.

episodes.name: The Great Baseball Card Scheme
episodes.overview: Grandfather Stratton schemes with Rick to corner the baseball card market.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Harry
episodes.overview: Kate's Uncle Harry uses the Stratton family in a deceptive maneuver to impress an old Army buddy.

episodes.name: One Strike and You're Out
episodes.overview: Rick leads his friends in a picket line against Grandfather Stratton for paying unfair wages to student employees.

episodes.name: Race with Eagles
episodes.overview: In an effort to prove that he is athletic, Edward decides to participate in a race up to the top of the Empire State Building.

episodes.name: Judgment Day
episodes.overview: When Edward lectures him about his poor geometry grade, Rick goes crazy trying to improve it.

episodes.name: Daddy Rick
episodes.overview: Rick takes part in a marriage with a student, but is shocked when his ""wife"" gets pregnant.

episodes.name: One for the Road (1)
episodes.overview: Rick's new friend encourages him to try alcohol.

episodes.name: One for the Road (2)
episodes.overview: Rick gets grounded, which effectively ends his experience with alcohol, but he soon learns that Greg is still drinking.

episodes.name: Rick Sings
episodes.overview:
Rick's the manager of his friend's band, Splat!

When Rick gets them on Rock Search, the lead singer has laryngitis.  The band convinces Rick to step in for him & sing that tune.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: As prom night approaches, Rick jilts a girl whose father is rumored to be associated with the mob.

episodes.name: Rick at 16
episodes.overview: Rick wants to invite Nicole Desmond to be his date at his 16th birthday party but Brad accidentally gives the invitation to Julie Warren. When Nicole gets herself invited anyway Rick has to balance his time between two dates without letting either girl find out about the other.

episodes.name: Second Best
episodes.overview: Rick feels inferior to his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Kate's grandmother gets lost in New York City.

episodes.name: The Live-In
episodes.overview: A new housekeeper from Sweden steals Rickys heart.

episodes.name: Rick Sells His Sole
episodes.overview: Rick takes a job at shoe store, only to become a victim of nepotism when he loses a promotion to his employer's nephew.

episodes.name: The Beach House
episodes.overview: While Ricky is on vacation, he meets a beautiful girl.

episodes.name: Rick Moves Out
episodes.overview: When Rick thinks that he has no privacy,he moves into the guest house. But Ricks friends think they could use it for parties.

episodes.name: Rick's Learning Problem
episodes.overview: Rick tutors a star football player, who must pass a history test in order to play for the championship. Edward gets the flu, and is getting on Rick and Kate's nerves.

episodes.name: Kate Lassos a Longhorn
episodes.overview: Rick agrees to care for a boa constrictor, which soon becomes an uninvited guest at Kate's business dinner.

episodes.name: Band on the Run
episodes.overview:
Rick, Brad, Alfonzo & two others form a band getting ready for the Battle of the Bands.  However, Brad & Alfonzo fight over issues & that Alfonzo invites his new girlfriend (Kiki) to rehearsal.

Rick tries to convince Alfonzo to rejoin the band.

episodes.name: Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: Rick's basketball idol is arrested for possession of narcotics.

episodes.name: Mon Amour
episodes.overview: Grandfather Stratton returns home from a trip to Paris--with a young fiancee.

episodes.name: Edward's Big Adventure
episodes.overview: Edward loses his wallet while playing pool. But when he calls Rick for help, Rick believes it to be an April Fool's joke.

episodes.name: Let It Snow, Let It Snow
